scMethrix 0.0.0.0001

Principal Component Analysis

Source: R/scMethrix_dimensionality.R
pca_scMethrix.Rd

Principal Component Analysis

pca_scMethrix(
  scm,
  assay = "score",
  var = "top",
  top_var = 1000,
  verbose = FALSE,
  n_components = 2,
  ...
)

Arguments

scm

Input scMethrix object
assay

The assay to use. Default is 'score'
var

Choose between random CpG sites ('rand') or most variable CpGs ('top'). Default 'top'
top_var

Number of variable CpGs to use. Default 1000 Set it to NULL to use all CpGs (which is not recommended due to memory requirements).
verbose

flag to output messages or not
n_components

Number of components to use
...

arguments passed to or from other methods. If x is a formula one might specify scale. or tol.

Value

scMethrix object with reducedDim 'PCA'

Details

Do PCA stuff. NA values will be removed.

See also

plot_pca() for plotting

Examples

data('scMethrix_data')
pca_scMethrix(scMethrix_data)

#> Taking top 1000 most variable CpGs for the reduction
#> Removed 227 CpGs due to NA
#> An object of class scMethrix
#>    n_CpGs: 286
#>    n_samples: 4
#>    assays: score, counts
#>    reduced dims: PCA
#>    is_h5: FALSE
#>    Reference: hg19
#>    Physical size: 42.7 Kb
